items.content_html:
Migrated all of my e-mail from Fastmail to Tutanota today.

I wasn’t using too many of the features on Fastmail, so I decided to go with the more secure, cheaper option at Tutanota.

Knowing me, I’ll either switch back or move back over to Proton in a couple of weeks.
items.content_text:
Migrated all of my e-mail from [Fastmail](https://www.fastmail.com) to [Tutanota](https://www.tutanota.com) today. 

I wasn't using too many of the features on Fastmail, so I decided to go with the more secure, cheaper option at Tutanota. 

Knowing me, I'll either switch back or move back over to [Proton](https://proton.me) in a couple of weeks.

items.content_html:
Way more happy than I should be to have my Breville Oracle Touch back from repair.

I almost forgot what a good cup of home brewed coffee tasted like.
